name: range(of:options:range:locale:)
desc: Finds and returns the range of the first occurrence of a given string within a given range of the string, subject to given options, using the specified locale, if any.
declaration:
func range(of searchString: String, 
   options mask: NSString.CompareOptions = [], 
     range rangeOfReceiverToSearch: NSRange, 
    locale: Locale?) -> NSRange
